rukus.text: 26|3|Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kunō shite iru kotodearou.
26|4|Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou.
26|5|Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashī kunkai ga motarasa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru.
26|6|Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono gurō suru koto ga, shinjitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu.
26|7|Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni ōku no, subete no tōtoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o.
26|8|Hontōni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|9|Hontōni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu.
